snippet: Mitt Romney congratulates Rick Santorum and then tries to minimize the battles he lost.
abstract: Mitt Romney congratulates Rick Santorum and then tries to minimize the battles he lost.
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA - After a string of losses Tuesday night, Mitt Romney landed in Georgia and promptly took questions from his traveling press corps, congratulating Rick Santorum for his strong showing in Colorado, Minnesota and Missouri the night before, while simultaneously trying to to minimize the results.

headline.main: Romney Plays Down Import of Tuesday's Losses
